channel.title: Some 525 deob questions
channel.description: i would like to know some of thse answers, because they are simple and it would make things easier for me. 1. How to change NPC hp 2. How to change/delete/add npcs into the server (like delta autospawn.cfg) 3. Change item prices in stores 4. How to change item stats 5. add objects 6. add coordinates to portals 7. were are commands located 8. Change were magic teleports take you too (e.g varrock teleport on the spellbook), and to require them no runes to use i found out other things myself like changing login messages, timed messages,interface messages,npc messages,shop stocks etc. But i cant seem to find these ones out.. could someone point me to them? i mines is codeusa

item.title: Some 525 deob questions
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

1.U can change hp in spawn.cfg but not sure.
2.U can add npc in same file spawn.cfg-find npc id in id list after that go in spawn.cfg scroll down till u see endofspawn or sumthing,copy paste 1 line before(for sample) and add it before endlist.Then u can change cords and and other stuff.
4.u can change item power in item.cfg
commands are in net-packethandler.
Teleports u can cnage in player.java.
Player.java to add objects-find this :getActionSender().addStaticObject(object id,0,cordsx,cordsy,0,10);.Hope i helped.If need more add me on msm battlearmada@inbox.lv(working whit codeusa 525 to)Btw tell me how did u add npc message and server time message i added time message but mine didnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Some 525 deob questions
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

i would like to know some of thse answers, because they are simple and it would make things easier for me.

  1. How to change NPC hp
  2. How to change/delete/add npcs into the server (like delta autospawn.cfg)
  3. Change item prices in stores
  4. How to change item stats
  5. add objects
  6. add coordinates to portals
  7. were are commands located
  8. Change were magic teleports take you too (e.g varrock teleport on the spellbook), and to require them no runes to use
    i found out other things myself like changing login messages, timed messages,interface messages,npc messages,shop stocks etc.
    But i cant seem to find these ones outâ€¦ could someone point me to them?
    i mines is codeusa
